name: CP006 Special
description:
Special version of Cyberpunk Prototype "VLADIMIR" for Metaverse.

Smart, tough, crazy. Will kick the shit out of your enemy. Can drink limitless amount of vodka without going drunk but only gain power from it. 

Singing Soviet hymn with ultrasound he kills enemie's broadcasting frequencies, electronic, radio and satellite.

Special x-ray lenses can see through the walls. 

Almost unbeatable Russian beast. When meeting with a bear, controls his mind.
